LanguageData.SpacefullnessExplain: Replace the vanilla space formula with follows:\n\nSpacefullness = penalty*(freecell/totalcell)*100%
LanguageData.SpacefullnessLabel: Set minimal spacefullness for each level:
LanguageData.PenaltyExplain: Reduces spacefullness if the room size smaller than:
LanguageData.PenaltyFormula:
(e.g., preventing a 1*2 jail considered as "Extremely Spacious")

Penalty can be calculated as follows:

penalty = totalcell/configured value
LanguageData.Comment: \n\nRestart your game to apply settings above
